column4: is it possible to revert to a previous version of ubuntu (8.04) after I told it to update to 8.10, or do I have to reinstall the thing?
you *could* edit your sources.list but its highly recommended just to reinstall
can you get into a vt?
when the login screen freezes, can you hit ctrl-alt-f1 and get a virtual terminal?
oh, no.. once it is stuck I have to hard reset... only way to get terminal is in rescue mode
what kind of system is this? this is a serios error
worked great on everything including 8.04.. nothing after
uhh.. who built it, whats the model number on the mobo
you shouldnt see these problems, does that board have an onboard video controller?
yes and no way to disable it in the bios
is there a lpg1 jumper on that board?
i'll have to check the manual
